resources.string:
This application shows the shadow generated by the sun on a given object, for a particular day and time.
 
 You can move the slider to change the time from the selected day (today as default) and see the projected shadow.
 
 If the compass is not working correctly or it is very instable, select the current time and day (option menu "now"), press the screen (one or two times) to stop the sensor rotations, and move the phone until the shadow you see in the reality has the same direction than the shadow in the screen. Now move the slider to see the shadow evolution during the day.
 
 The internet connection is only necessary to obtain the location information, and not for the shadow calculations.
